Description_Content: The system shall allow exporting all data sections (Req, Spec, Test) into a single CSV file for external editing.
The system must allow importing a unified CSV file to update all tables simultaneously.
Upon import, the system must automatically restore visual badges (e.g. Functional, Core) and clickable trace links (e.g. REQ-001) from plain text.
Iterate through all collapsible sections, extract table rows, and prepend a 'Section_Source' column to identify the origin table.
On import: 1. Use Col 1 to target correct table. 2. Check Col 2 to apply CSS badges. 3. Use Regex to convert IDs (REQ-XX) into anchor tags.
1. Export current data. 2. Edit CSV in Excel (add row). 3. Import CSV. > Expect: New row appears, badges are colored, links are clickable.
